Oh dear. I think they might have been doing some changes, as my account page changed again this morning

elements.text: Oh dear. I think they might have been doing some changes, as my account page changed again this morning

text: They've been suspending events when they do changes. I think this is a crash.

elements.text: They've been suspending events when they do changes. I think this is a crash.

text: Yeah, looks like everything is about to go down now

text:
nice, found it, ujson causing issues, anyone able to translate?
```Jun 11 14:03:07 ip-172-31-38-187 kernel: python[5081]: segfault at 0 ip 00007f4b75638a49 sp 00007f4b6cff76f0 error 4 in ujson.cpython-38-x86_64-linux-gnu.so[7f4b7562f000+14000]```

elements.text: nice, found it, ujson causing issues, anyone able to translate?
Jun 11 14:03:07 ip-172-31-38-187 kernel: python[5081]: segfault at 0 ip 00007f4b75638a49 sp 00007f4b6cff76f0 error 4 in ujson.cpython-38-x86_64-linux-gnu.so[7f4b7562f000+14000]

text: You’d need to have compiled with debug symbols to see the source file name and line number

elements.text: You’d need to have compiled with debug symbols to see the source file name and line number

text: In other words, can't really tell anything from that

elements.text: In other words, can't really tell anything from that

text: yeah, looking at the issue log it could be one of many different things, wonder if bflw should using a different library..

elements.text: yeah, looking at the issue log it could be one of many different things, wonder if bflw should using a different library..

text: I have made the decision to use the built in library for "live" data, for historical I'm more open to unstable libraries for speed.

elements.text: I have made the decision to use the built in library for "live" data, for historical I'm more open to unstable libraries for speed.

text: Can't say I've ever had any problems with it. Seems likely the issue here was it was given junk data because of Betfair API issues; obviously it would be better if it could handle this more robustly but if the two are related it's not like you'd have been able to run your system anyway

elements.text: Can't say I've ever had any problems with it. Seems likely the issue here was it was given junk data because of Betfair API issues; obviously it would be better if it could handle this more robustly but if the two are related it's not like you'd have been able to run your system anyway

text: Yeah I think your right, just hate the idea of an error like this

elements.text: Yeah I think your right, just hate the idea of an error like this

text: Anyone have any error messages from the API around the exact time it crashed? Betfair claiming to me the crash was at 13:25 but it was clearly around 13:18

elements.text: Anyone have any error messages from the API around the exact time it crashed? Betfair claiming to me the crash was at 13:25 but it was clearly around 13:18
